title: Laboratory Methods for Ill Liver Analyze
content: The aim of this article is to identify the best available evidences analyzing liver samples, normall and pathological. In the study were used liver samples, collected during necropsy, from healthy patients and from patients diagnosed with cirrhosis .This mentioned, are known as routinally practice for hepatitis C diagnosis, which conduct to hepatic cirrhosis.  In this study direction, chronic liver diseases stimulate a degree of  hepatocyte injury. So previously mentioned modifications, alters thet affect the liver architecture and finally ends in cirrhosis are well analyse on microscopic preparates. Folowing morphological steps, it is possible to analyse normal and alterate liver structure, on colored preparates.
